messagebox¶

decida.messagebox.messagebox(parent=None, message='continue')¶

yes/no question dialog.

arguments:

parent (tkinter pointer)

reference or parent window for dialog placement. if parent=None, dialog placed at mid-screen.

message (string) (optional, default="continue")

message to display, or prompt for yes/no answer.
